Recommendations.Title: Do You Need Planning Permission? | Hyndburn Borough Council
Key Strengths: Ease of access with clear and concise language
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides an invaluable resource for obtaining information on the types of changes you can make without a specific planning application. It also contains useful advice about when you will require planning permission.

Recommendations.Title: Permitted development for householders - Technical guidance
Key Strengths: Detailed technical guidance regarding permitted development
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides an informative guide about different types of modifications that are permissible without a planning application, with regards to the size and nature of those developments.

Recommendations.Title: Report for Planning Committee ... - Hyndburn Borough Council
Key Strengths: Detailed report on solar panel installation application
Includes technical aspects, council decisions and procedures
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link offers a comprehensive document detailing the proposal of installing solar panels on non-domestic property for the Committee Review. The report covers crucial details regarding the PV panel arrays, building regulations issues, legal requirements and council's decision process.

Recommendations.Title: Report for Planning Committee ... - Hyndburn Borough Council
Key Strengths: Detailed report on a community-owned solar generating facility application
Includes information about optimal orientation of solar panels and metal cladding
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides detailed explanations and supporting documents for an application seeking planning permission for the erection of a new community-owned solar facility. The document also includes an analysis on roof profiles and elevations adaptation.

Recommendations.Title: Hyndburn 2037 The Local Plan
Key Strengths: Offers information on the Hyndburn Local Plan
Contains references to solar renewable installation
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link offers a guide to the local plan for the Borough of Hyndburn, covering various areas for development and planning. While not specific to customer information needs related to solar panels, it does offer relevant information regarding planning permission and permitted development rights.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: The search results contained a variety of documents from the council website, but not all were directly applicable to seeking information on obtaining planning permission for installing solar panels. However, the top five recommendations identified documents that either focus specifically on the topic, or contain detailed reports discussing solar panel projects that could provide relevant insights.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: While there is a wealth of information available through the search results, some of the links were overly technical or specific to completed or reviewed projects. The top recommendations prioritize easy-to-understand general guidance on obtaining planning permission for solar panels and detailed reports discussing the process.
